name: Aether Knights Post Jam
description:
Play as Riley a war hero who is brought back to life as an Aether Knight. Power up your Gaia Armor and beat the Warlords of the Aether Realm.

Keyboard Controls:
Space = Jump (triple jump), Glide (in air)
A = Left
D = Right
S = Crouch
W = Look up
F = Dash (can be used in air)
Mouse = Aim
Mouse 1 = Shoot/Attack
Mouse 2 or Q = Jet pack (hold)
Left Ctrl = Sprint/Run (hold)
T = Switch Weapon
I = Inventory
Tab = Switch Aim view (Mouse/Analog 1/Analog 2)

Please leave feedback and if possible screenshots and gif of bugs and polish requests and the team and I will get to them. Thanks!

BUG FIXES:

Added checkpoints on prologue area and Main Game. Riley starts out with no abilities on Main Game. Fixed some boss bugs.
